Title: European Union direct award justification (TED schema)
Description: Justification for using a procedure which allows awarding contracts directly without the requirement of publishing a call for competition in the Official Journal of the European Union. This scheme's codes match those in the TED schema.

Title: European Union direct award justification (eForms)
Description: Justification for using a procedure which allows awarding contracts directly without the requirement of publishing a call for competition in the Official Journal of the European Union. This scheme's codes match those in eForms.
